review_data.title: Fresh and savory vietnamese street food
review_data.content: This small take away is located just accross dammweg tram stop and serves freshly prepared dishes every lunch. The bun (vietnamese bowl with rice noodle and toppings of choice) and the banh mi's (franco-vietnamese sandwich) come with beef, chicken or tofu as well as pickled...More
